SYSTEM: 00_IntroductionSemanticWeb.pdf: Página 5
© O. Corcho, A. Gómez-Pérez
5
A 10-minute Introduction to Ontologies and the Semantic Web
What’s the Problem?
• Typical web page 
markup consists of:
• Rendering information 
(e.g., font size and colour)
• Hyper-links to related 
content
• Semantic content is 
accessible to humans 
but not (easily) to 
computers…
speaker: SYSTEM
